level.heading: Director of Industrial Safety.
level.text: The Board is hereby authorized to employ a Director of Industrial Safety, who shall not be a member of the Board. The Director shall perform such duties as may be prescribed by the Board in administering the provisions of this subchapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-139
level.text: Law 2-139, the "District of Columbia Government Comprehensive Merit Personnel Act of 1978," was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 2-10, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 17, 1978 and October 31, 1978, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 22, 1978, it was assigned Act No. 2-300 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 7-186
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-186, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 32-801.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Repeal of chapter: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 32-801.
